title: Koukaku Kidoutai: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society 3D - Tachikoma na Hibi

synonyms: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society 3D - Tachikoma na Hibi
Kokaku Kidotai S.A.C. Solid State Society 3D - Tachikoma na Hibi
alternative_titles.en: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex: Solid State Society 3D: Tachikomatic Days
alternative_titles.ja: 攻殻機動隊 S.A.C. Solid State Society 3D タチコマな日々

synopsis: Three new 3D Tachikomatic shorts released with the 3D version of Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society on blu-ray and also in a BD-box with all the Tachikoma shorts.
